divs: Sighting DetailsRaw footage taken through a 23X sports scope using a near infrared webcam. Several orbs "orbit" around each other in the field of view of the sports telescope. Very difficult to keep the scope centred as the orbs moved around in spiral patterns quite quickly.
Summary: Raw Footage ORBs Above Calgary Alberta
